name: LachesisRaymondBattle
_source: s;Raymond;Ha! Hahaha!{w} I'm looking at a god, and I can't stop laughing!|No more runes to hide behind, eh?{w} No more delusional priests?|Oh, I will enjoy this!
s;Lachesis;You were promising, once.{w} A shame that I gave my blessing wantonly.|It was a mistake for you to outlive your purpose.
